title: Expand learning units and extend minigame duration

requirements.summary: Increase time limits for all minigames to make gameplay sessions longer
acceptanceCriteria: Time limits in difficulty.ts are increased by at least 50% for all difficulty levels
All five minigame components reflect the extended time limits
Users have more time to complete each minigame round

Item count scaling in difficulty.ts is adjusted upward
